author: CandCEdinburgh
title: Good location and value
text:
I have stayed in Paris several times and this is by favourite hotel so far.
When we arrive it was late and dark and we thought it was a dodgy area and a building site.
However Bercy Village in minutes away and lovely. Metro is right there to get anywhere. One stop from Gare de Lyon for Disney or Val d' Europe shopping.
Hotel was clean, couple English speaking TV channels, huge bathroom and a good temperature. Good free wifi in room.
